title: A taste of Scandinavian HORROR
description:
I give you the BOOK OF SAMPLES. This is a collection of samples from my work of short horror stories. If you like what you read then you can go to my website or even better, buy my book: The Dead Will Inherit the Earth.

# Title: The Dead Will Inherit the Earth
# Paperback: 178 pages
# Language: English
# ISBN-10: 1847993478
# ISBN-13: 978-1847993472

I guess that the info above is helpful if you should happen to be interested of getting the book. If you do like what you read and want more then let me know. I am working on a new collection but who knows? I just might give away some of the stories for free!

Drop by

deadtales(dot)com

The author
